SUB_W14_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Mmm. These are the visions I see at the
end of my green waves, but I've never
beheld so many at once.

SUB_W14_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Mmm. These visions are not mine.
Does this suggest there is someone
here? Someone with the ability to
view this many visions at once?

SUB_W14_WRLD_SIUG_SCAN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_WRLD_SIUG_SCAN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Is this the chair from which they watch
the visions? Let us take a closer look.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Why, if it isn't Siugnas!
What brings you here to Providence?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_010.text:
Is it you who generated these visions?
And how do you know my name?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_020.text:
My, but you do enjoy asking questions!
Or perhaps you merely take some
special interest in me?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_030.text:
I most certainly do. I wonder what it is
that you hide, and if any worthy thralls
might be found in these visions of yours.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Perceptive as ever, I see... Well then?
Aren't you going to ask me which visions
will reveal the dark presences you seek?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_050.text:
There is no need. They will reveal
themselves to me in time so long
as I continue searching.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_060.text:
Ha ha ha! Will it truly be so easy?
Oh, but I DO look forward to watching
this all play out for you.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_000.text:
It is just as I said, is it not? Finding beings
of darkness is not so easy a matter here.
Or perhaps you have just discovered the
joy of watching so many visions instead?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_010.text:
The Dismal King has no need of haste.
As I move from vision to vision,
that which I seek will come to me.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_020.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_020.text:
Then please, watch all you desire—
for that is surely why you were
guided to this place. Heh heh.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_030.text:
Mmm. This one reveals little
of their true intentions.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_000.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh dear! Are we becoming flustered
due to our failure to find any
worthwhile thralls? Oh, but don't despair, dear Siugnas!
Plenty of chances remain.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_010.text:
Do not trouble yourself with the Dismal King.
Never before have I had an opportunity to
explore so many visions, and I mean to
take the time to enjoy myself properly.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_020.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_020.text:
I fear I do not know what you mean, Siugnas.
I've spent a great deal of time with these
visions, and have never once experienced
any enjoyment from the process.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_030.text:
You merely observe as these myriad 
wonders play out before your eyes?
I find that difficult to believe.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_000_CUT_00.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_000_CUT_00.text: That is the question, isn't it?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_000_CUT_00.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_000_CUT_00.text: This is where you die, Siugnas.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_000_CUT_00.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_000_CUT_00.text:
You should have departed the moment you
found your thrall, yet you chose to
continue watching visions instead. And now you can bear witness
to your final one—for your fate
has already been sealed.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_000_CUT_00.text:
I have spent a great deal of time here in
Providence meddling in your visions so I
might make the outcome suit my desires.
This one will be no different.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_000_CUT_00.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_000_CUT_00.text:
How absurd. Your final moments might
play out in various ways, but the end
result ever remains the same. I have watched this vision time and time
again, Siugnas; your fate was set the
moment you arrived in Providence.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_000_CUT_00.text:
As a mere observer, perhaps you are
incapable of understanding the concept
of intervention. Allow me to educate you.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_000_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_000_CUT_01.text:
Are you truly claiming you can
reverse even your own visions?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_000_CUT_01.text:
If fate actually exists, it is clearly
something each of us can shape with
our own choices. I am the Dismal King,
and I subjugate even destiny itself!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_000_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_000_CUT_01.text: But at some point you will have to confront the fate of the worlds, for the overturning of a destiny always comes at great cost. So I will continue to watch you, Dismal King, for I wish to see the surprise on your face when that bill finally comes due.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_000_CUT_01.text:
Do as you will, but I cannot promise to
act in the manner you expect. Farewell.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_010_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_010_CUT_01.text:
I envied you once, Siugnas—and even
thought you might finally be the one
to change the way I live. And it turns out I was correct:
I meddled in a vision for the first
and last time, and used it to guide
your wave to this very door.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_010_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_010_CUT_01.text:
I have been watching you for a long time,
and know you possess countless futures. So do not worry, O Dismal King!
Instead, believe in your waves
and keep moving ever forward.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_010_CUT_01.text:
Oh no. You do not get to simply
end this matter upon your whim.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_010_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_010_CUT_01.text: Siugnas? What do you think you're—

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_010_CUT_01.text:
The darkness within you is beautiful, Observer.
Even as you spoke of fate being unchangeable,
you sought someone to alter your own—so now
the Dismal King will grant your desire!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_010_CUT_01.text:
From this moment forth,
your destiny belongs to me. You will continue to serve as the Observer,
watching the endless visions here for eternity.
For that is what makes your fell darkness
shine all the brighter.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_010_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_010_CUT_01.text:
Yes... I will continue to observe for you,
my Dismal King, until the end finally comes
to the Conjoined Worlds...

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_020_CUT_01.text:
So that was the last of your
visions I will ever see.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_020_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_020_CUT_01.text:
Is this how you've always gone
about things, Siugnas?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_020_CUT_01.text:
It is the result of obeying
the desires of my heart.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_020_CUT_01.text:
It is a freedom you lack because you are
connected to the destinies of so many.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_020_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_020_CUT_01.text:
Sad but true. I cannot permit myself to
join you on your destiny alone, Siugnas,
for the visions I see are legion.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_020_CUT_01.text:
A pity I was never able to expose your
true face in the end—but I suppose we
all need something to look forward to.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_020_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_020_CUT_01.text: Then you have nothing to look forward to, because all I will do is sit and watch until the end of the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_020_CUT_01.text:
In that case, I suggest you continue to
watch me—because I will certainly not
forget you. Farewell, Observer.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_020_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_SIUG_020_CUT_01.text:
Oh, I will be watching you
until the bitter end, Siugnas.

SUB_W14_WRLD_SIUG_WQUEST_INITIAL_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_WRLD_SIUG_WQUEST_INITIAL_000_CUT.text:
Such an incredible quantity of visions!
Yet none are connecting to me.

SUB_W14_WRLD_SIUG_WQUEST_INITIAL_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_WRLD_SIUG_WQUEST_INITIAL_000_CUT.text:
These visions must belong
to someone else.

SUB_W14_SCAN_SIUG_WQUEST_1ST_SCAN_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_SCAN_SIUG_WQUEST_1ST_SCAN_000_CU.text:
There is a chair in the center of
the room. Let us take a closer look.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I sense your presence, creature.
Show yourself to the Dismal King!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_030.text:
I am... Well, you may
call me the Observer.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Then it is you to whom these visions
belong—and it is with this power
that you knew I would come.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_050.text:
My visions can intrude into any world at
any time, projecting to me those whose
lives totter in the vicissitudes of fate.
I behold them without pause. Such is my fate.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_060.text:
How fascinating. And yet, to passively
watch sounds extraordinarily tedious.
Have you no urge to intervene?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_070.text:
None can defy their fate, nor do the
destinies of strangers affect me.
What meaning could possibly be found
in attempting to save them?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_080.text:
I did not ask you to save them—merely to give
a little push. Sometimes that is all it takes to
set someone walking the path of darkness.
Why, it may even change their destiny.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_090.text:
I thought you might say that. So come, then!
Sit in this chair. Doing so will grant you the
ability to meddle in my visions and alter
all the fates you like.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_100.text:
As much as I would prefer not to
play along with your little game,
I will take the seat you offer.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
Oh, damn it all! I can't believe the
fiends caught up with me when
I was so close to the village!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
Well, everyone in town is on the brink
of starvation, so I've no choice but to
protect this food with my very life.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
Are you here to rescue me!? I don't know
who you are, but I'll never forget this!
Thank you so much!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
You would have the Dismal King
battle your fiends for you?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
Using the Dismal King to shield his
own life? What a fascinating fellow.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text:
Oh, damn it all! I can't believe the
fiends caught up with me when
I was so close to the village!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text:
I can't die now! I have to get
these medicinal plants back to
my sick little sister!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text:
Hey, you're the one who saved me the
other day! Thank you again! I owe you!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text:
To discern my strength in an instant and
immediately set it to work protecting himself
from fiends? A surprisingly potent individual.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
Where the hell is the bomb disposal unit!?
This thing's about to blow, and we'll
never get the civvies out in time!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
About damn time, bomb guy! Get over here
and stop that detonator already!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
I am not a bomb guy.
I am the Dismal King.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
We don't have time for this! The detonator
has chips of three colors: red, blue, and yellow.
If you put 'em back in their original order,
it stops the timer.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text: Then perhaps you should do that.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
I can't! I don't know the original order!
But I don't think any of the chips were
in the same position that they are now.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
Uh, I think the blue chip was somewhere
to the right of the red chip?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
There are three chips: red, blue, and yellow.
When returned to their original order,
the bomb is rendered inert. The original order had all three chips
in different positions than they are now,
with the blue chip somewhere to the right
of the red one.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text: Let us go over that again.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text: It is time to disarm it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text: Very well. I shall make the attempt.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.text:
A trivial matter for
the Dismal King.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.text:
Thank you so much. You have no idea
how many lives you saved today.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.text: Only one life matters to me.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Everyone, please remain calm! There's a whole
herd of fiends out there, but we'll be safe
so long as we stay in this shelter.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Excuse me, but has anyone seen my cat!?
I don't see Lady Purrs-A-Lot anywhere,
and I'm afraid she may have run outside!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
No, ma'am, I haven't seen your cat,
and I'm afraid I can't let you outside.
Now please just sit down and be calm.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Nooo! Lady Purrs-A-Lot!
I have to go find her!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Ma'am, what are you doing!?
Do NOT go outside!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Do you wish to be consumed
by a fiend, woman?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
My sweet little kitty might be outside!
I have to go find her!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text: Very well. Let us go look.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text: You are mistaken. Search the shelter.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text: Oh, what a nice young man!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text: No, you idiot! Don't open the door!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text: Well, I suppose it's possible that she's still around here, but I've been searching for quite a while now...

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Gah! They've broken down the door!
We got fiends incoming, people!
Run for your lives!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_010.text:
There is no one to interfere now.
Find your cat, woman.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_010.text:
Ah. She is dead. What frail
creatures these humans are.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.text:
The fiends are slain, woman.
You've nothing more to fear.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.text:
Lady Purrs-A-Lot! There you are!
Oh, Mama has been so worried!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.text: Ah. So she was inside after all.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.text: You are a lifesaver, young man!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
It's been over 10 days since I entered this
sweltering jungle in search of the legendary
Great Beast. My provisions have run out,
and I've now become thoroughly lost. Yes, this may well be
the place I die...

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
The Great Beast! I've found it at last!
I must catch it immediately!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text: You've precious little hope of catching that creature, my fine fellow. But if you wish to die, I will not dissuade you.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
Heavens, there's someone else out here!?
Who are you, sir, and why have you... No, that doesn't matter. I have staked my
very life on capturing the Great Beast,
so I suggest you stay out of my way!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
The purity of his desire
is so beautiful.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
That beast was mighty enough to
challenge even the Dismal King!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
You fool! You thrice-damned fool!
I came here to CAPTURE the beast,
and you've gone and SLAIN it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
Yes, the creature deserved better than
death—even one by my hallowed hand.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
My beast... Give me back
my precious beast!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
I feel quite certain the lost treasure of the
Empire is concealed deep within these tunnels,
but I've no idea which fork to take.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
You there! You look like quite
the intuitive fellow!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: You are addressing me?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Which fork would you choose?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Mmm.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The left.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The middle.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The right.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Then I shall defer to your
great wisdom. Tally-ho!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
A king's judgment will
never steer you wrong.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Another fork. Which way this time,
my fine adventuring friend!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Mmm.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The left.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The middle.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The right.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Very well. We shall proceed thusly.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
I am quite excited to
see what we might find.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: There are three chests.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Eureka! This is, without a doubt,
the lost treasure of the Empire! But according to the literature,
only one chest holds what we seek,
while the others are but fiendish traps.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Hmm? What's this written on the wall?
'The untrodden path will guide you
to the treasure.'

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Hmm? What's this written on the wall?
'The untrodden paths hide traps.'

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Well, friend? Which do you believe
to be the real treasure?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Mmm. A fine question.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
'The untrodden path will guide
you to the treasure,' eh...?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
'The untrodden paths hide
traps,' eh...?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The real chest is on the left.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The real chest is in the middle.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The real chest is on the right.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Huzzah! Nothing to
do now but open it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Is this what you seek?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
The lost treasure of the Empire
is mine at last!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Your judgment has served me well,
my fine fellow. Thank you so much!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
That was it? I had so hoped to
behold a new type of darkness.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Empty. Ah, but there's something
written on the bottom.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
'The punishment for thieves is death.'
That doesn't sound good.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: An earthquake?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
It's a trap—the tunnels are collapsing!
Run for it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: You'll never make it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: GAAAAAAHHH!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.text:
I'm involved in the preservation of the
wild bird population, and am currently
investigating how many have returned
to these woods due to our efforts.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.text:
Behold! At this moment,
a bird flies towards us!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.text:
Sweet feathers, that's no bird!
It's a fiend!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_01.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_01.text:
With that fiend gone, even more wild birds
will now return to our magnificent forests.
You've done a great service to all of our
winged friends this day!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_01.text: Carry on with your efforts, then.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
I am indeed, for an accurate survey of the
bird population is a necessary component
of our environmental-protection efforts.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text: You seem quite passionate about this.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
966. ...No, wait. That was a fiend.
It doesn't count.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, and the one before that was a fiend
as well, so let's exclude that.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, and there are four
more birds over there.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text: Oh! I see six birds there!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
And that makes... Goodness, I've lost
track. Where is the count at now?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, yes. Thank you. One must always
have an accurate count, after all!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
This is all that happens?
How utterly disappointing.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Er, are you certain? Because I thought...
Aaargh! Talking to you has made me lose
track of the count completely!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Enough! Do not speak to me again.
Now farewell.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text: The cliff's edge is that way.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
To think a minor miscount led to
this outcome. How fascinating!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
It's finished! It's finally complete!
A blade with the perfect combination of
flexibility and strength, and a temper
pattern that simply ripples with life! As a swordsmith, this blade will
surely be my masterpiece!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: All that remains is to give it a name worthy of its majesty. I hereby dub thee...Darkblayde!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Mmm. I think not.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: A fine name!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: You there! What is your problem?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Are you certain you wish for your masterwork
to be known as Darkblayde? Think carefully,
for a name can define one's nature.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Well, of course it can! That's the POINT! Oh, but fine. I'll try again. I hereby dub thee...Deathblayde!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Mmm. I think not.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: A fine name!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: NOW what's your problem?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: You are certain you wish to call your sword 'Deathblayde'? That is the level of creation we are dealing with?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Fine, fine. I'll reconsider.
We'll call it...Dreadblayde!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Mmm. I think not.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: A fine name!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Surely you can do better than
that feckless moniker.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Shut up, shut up, SHUT UUUUUUP!
I don't even care anymore!
I'm done thinking of names!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
You would shatter your blade?
Your so-called masterpiece?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
This was supposed to be my masterpiece,
and now I can't even stand to look at it!
Get out of my sight, damn you!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Then I will take my leave. I have much
enjoyed our exchange, swordsmith.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Then you will be forevermore known as Darkblayde Hideyoshi!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: May power infuse its steel!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Then you will be forevermore known as Deathblayde Ieyasu!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: May power infuse its steel!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Then you will be forevermore known as Dreadblayde Nobunaga!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: May power infuse its steel!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
I am suddenly overcome with an urge
to put this sword's edge to the test...
And your ripe flesh will do nicely!
Bwa ha! Bwaaa ha ha ha!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Wonderful! Show me your worth!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: What... What have I done!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
I will be keeping this sword, smith.
You should focus on bringing your next
masterwork of darkness into the world.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
What is this place? ...Mmm?
There's something here.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Waaaaaah! Waaaaaah!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
What happened? I cannot understand
through your constant weeping.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
I fell into the sea and was swallowed
by a giant fish and I wanna get out
of here... Waaah!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
This is the stomach of a fish, then?
Mmm. How are we to escape?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: I will set a fire.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: I will rampage.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: I will do nothing.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
The fish will be forced to react
if we light its stomach ablaze.
Let us burn that pile of garbage.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
And when the fish coughs out the smoke,
we take the opportunity to get away!
Gee, mister! You sure are smart! Oh, and I saw some matches
over there we can use.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Now burn. Burn! BURN!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Ah, what a lovely conflagration.
The entire stomach is filling with smoke.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Oh no, mister! Look over there!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Are those explosives? Mmm.
They seem likely to explode, if so.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
How can you be so calm about that!?
Gyaaa! It's too laaate!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Aaah ha ha ha! Wonderful!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
If we can cause the creature intolerable
amounts of internal pain, it will likely
grow weary and vomit us forth.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Gee, mister! You sure are smart!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Behold my dark power!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Is it working, mister?
Did the fish open its mouth?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Not yet. To think this creature is
capable of enduring the might
of the Dismal King!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh no, mister! There are fiends
coming at us from further down!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Attracted by my darkness, no doubt!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
The floor here seems quite elastic.
It should be comfortable enough 
for us to take our ease.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
You want to SLEEP, mister? Now?
Gee, I dunno...

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
We have no need of haste; we can wait
for the creature to throw wide its maw.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Well, if you say so.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
I expect the creature's maw
will soon be thrown wide.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
You there. Wake up.
Mmm? Why do you not move?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Ah. His body has melted.
Digested while we slept, no doubt.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Come to think of it, I feel
a bit uncomfortable myself.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
My body! Curses! Now I will
require even more blood!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_01.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_01.text:
Look at that! The fish
opened its mouth!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_01.text:
That scuffle must have been rather
uncomfortable for the fish. But now
it is time for us to take our leave.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Perfection! Now that our new security
mech is ready, the city will be safe.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
You there! Sir! I'm sorry, but could you help
me activate this mech? I don't happen to
have a free hand at the moment.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: What would you have me do?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Do you see a lever and switch?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: I do.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
First, pull the lever down.
Next, press the switch three times.
Finally, raise the lever again.
This will activate the mech.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
First, press the switch two times.
Next, lower the lever and press the switch once.
Finally, raise the lever again.
This will activate the mech.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Lever, switch three times, lever.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Switch twice, lever, switch once, lever.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Incidentally, as a safety precaution,
any error in the start-up sequence
will cause the unit to self-destruct.
So do be careful, yes?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
A rather unusual philosophy
of design, I would think.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
When you have three doctorates, you can
design whatever mech you like. Now begin.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Then to start...

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Next...

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: The lever.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: The switch.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Success! It's starting up!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Yes, and now we can unleash your
self-destructing mech upon the city.
What fun this shall be!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Egads, you feckless oaf!
You've just activated the
self-destruct mechanism!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Ah. My apologies.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: WE'RE ALL GOING TO DIIIE!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Aaah ha ha ha! Wonderful!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Showgirl
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text:
Attention, everyone! If you visit our
department store today, you'll get
a chance to meet our popular new
mascot, Spendy McBigbucks!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Showgirl
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text:
Come on! Let's give our customers
a warm welcome, Spendy!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text:
It appears you've an actual
fiend in your midst.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text:
No one you need concern yourself with.
Incidentally, what is a 'mascot'?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Oh my gosh, you're late! Don't tell me you forgot that Capitol Cuisine! is airing live today!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
We don't have time for this, chef!
Just get in the studio!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
I am no chef.
I am the Dismal King.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Ah, there's nothing better than creating your own meals from scratch. Welcome, friends, to a special live edition of...Capitol Cuisine!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
We'll begin with the dough.
What are the ingredients, chef?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
Food preparation is no fit task for
the Dismal King! Ah, but I see the
names of these foodstuffs have been
scrawled beneath them.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
We'll begin with a caramel sauce.
What are the ingredients, chef?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
Next, we add the toppings.
What are the ingredients, chef?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
Next, we make the custard.
What are the ingredients, chef?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: And now we pop it in the oven.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Oooh, I can't wait to try it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh my, that cooked up nicely!
Let's try a little, shall we?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Kill the feed! KILL THE FEEEEEED!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
Nothing is beyond the capabilities
of the Dismal King.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: We'll see you all next week on Capitol Cuisine!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Boy
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
Are there really ghosts
in this abandoned house?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text: Yeah! My brother totally saw one!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
You are wise to tremble
in my presence, child.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Boy
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
Oh, it's just some guy.
Don't scare us like that!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
I am no ghost.
I am the Dismal King. And that is a far greater
threat than any specter!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
That is no ghost.
It is a fiend.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
See? I told you there
were ghosts here!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Boy
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text: I'm sorry. I believe you now.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
I suggest you return promptly
to your various abodes.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Don't shoot! I'm the real one!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Don't listen to her! I'm the real one!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: What is this?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
I was chasin' down a dangerous alien,
but when I took my eye off it for a second,
it shapeshifted into a goddamn civilian!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Now I can't tell 'em apart!
Which one do I shoot?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: That is your choice to make.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Shoot them both.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Damn it! I was so close to
gettin' the dirtbag—AND
to my retirement!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
How dare you point your gun
at a civilian!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm filing an official complaint!
I'll have your badge!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: An unfortunate outcome.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: The hell did you say!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
I told you to shoot them both.
Is that not what your heart
yearns to do?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Are you out of your goddamn mind!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
If you prefer, I will
happily do it myself.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: No, stop! I'm human, I swear!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Is this some kind of joke!?
You can't be serious!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: The Dismal King does not jest.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
This guy is out of his mind...
Well, there's no way I'm
going down without a fight!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Oh ho! You reveal yourself!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Quite the entertaining spectacle.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Buddy, you had me on the edge of my seat.
That was one heck of a performance!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: ...Performance?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Maru's my kitty! But I accidently left
a window open and he ran away.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
It appears to be in a
highly agitated state.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text: Run to your cat! Run, I say!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Oh no, he ran away!
You're a LIAR, mister!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Revel in your darkness, Maru!
Aaah ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
We have closed the distance,
yet the cat remains guarded.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text: Lock eyes and stare with ferocity.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Oh no, he ran away!
You're a LIAR, mister!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Aaaah ha ha ha ha ha!
Behold the depths of Maru's darkness!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Contain Maru's darkness, child.
Never let it slip away.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Assassin
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
Red Panther here: I've arrived at the
heart. Moving to eliminate the target.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Assassin
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
Sorry, pal. It's just business.
Nothing personal.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Assassin
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
My briefing didn't say anything about another
agent. Unless... Aw, hell! Don't tell me the
president's people caught wind of our plans!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Assassin
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
Doesn't matter! Get out of the way
unless you wanna be put on ice!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
I cannot begin to fathom
what transpired here.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.speaker: Trader
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.text:
Thank you. When I stumbled across those
fiends, I thought I was a dead man.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.speaker: Trader
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.text:
As a merchant, allow me to repay your
kindness with a reward of your choice.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.text: The Dismal King carries no water.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Will this prove adequate?
I received it earlier.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.text:
Impede me not, vile fiends! I must deliver 
this message from the king forthwith,
and my duty shall not be denied!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.text:
My heartiest thanks, blessed ser!
I am ever in your debt!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.text:
Loyalty is a road that oft ends in
the deepest dark, and now you are
free to continue on its path.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.text:
Fie! To think I might be ensnared by more
fell fiends with the castle near in sight! 
But the peril is no matter; this warning
must reach the king at any cost!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.text:
Your quest remains incomplete?
Hurry on, then!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.text:
Again!? My debt to you deepens
all the more, brave ser!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text: Mmm. We are deep in the woods.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Witch
Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text:
And what do you proffer the
Dismal King in return?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Witch
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text:
Complete the hunt first.
Such talk can follow.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text:
She would sic her prey upon me?
This woman lacks not for determination!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Witch
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text:
Yes, yes. As a reward,
I'll brew you something.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Daughter
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
I was bitten by this horrid snake earlier!
I didn't think it was serious, but the
thing turned out to be venomous,
and now I'm going to DIE!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
Mmm. You seem feverish. The venom must
already be coursing through your veins.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Daughter
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
Nooo! I'm too pretty to die!
You have to run and get a doctor!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
The Dismal King knows of no
apothecaries in the area.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
Sadly for you, it is beyond my power
to neutralize this venom.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text: Then this, too, is your fate.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: A storm? Am I aboard a ship?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
Ho there, landlubber!
Lend a hand!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
The ship took a real hit from the storm,
and we've lost both a sailor and a
treasure chest overboard!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
If we don't pull 'em both up fast,
they'll be at the bottom of the sea!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: Start by pulling up the treasure.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: Start by pulling up the sailor.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: Mmm? Where has the sailor gone?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: Damn the waves! We're too late!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: This seems the proper human way.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: Thank you... You saved my life...

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: But where has the chest gone?

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: Damn the waves! It took the treasure!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Worthy one, the Dismal King will now release
the darkness from your soul so you might
behave as you wish. Know that I will be
ever watching over you from afar.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_01.text:
The power of the Dismal King...
Ah, but my darkness feels sublime!

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Worthy one, I grant you the duty of
bringing more darkness into this world.
I eagerly anticipate your success.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_01.text: I will not fail you, O King.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_CUT_000_00.text:
I deem you worthy. Even should we part,
your soul will ever be with mine.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_CUT_000_01.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_CUT_000_01.text: Thank you for this honor, O King.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_030_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_030_CUT_000_00.text:
I deem you worthy. Even should we part,
your soul will ever be with mine.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_030_CUT_000_01.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_030_CUT_000_01.text: Thank you for this honor, O King.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_040_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_040_CUT_000_00.text:
I deem you worthy. Even should we part,
your soul will ever be with mine.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_040_CUT_000_01.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_040_CUT_000_01.text: Thank you for this honor, O King.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_050_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_050_CUT_000_00.text:
I deem you worthy. Even should we part,
your soul will ever be with mine.

SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_050_CUT_000_01.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_050_CUT_000_01.text: Thank you for this honor, O King.
